radiographic_examinations.findings: Mucosal hyperemia and friability; multiple biopsy samples were histologically normal.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A second gastroscopic examination showed hyperemia but no focal lesions.

radiographic_examinations.findings: The stomach was grossly normal; microscopic foci of intramucosal diffuse carcinoma were identified in two adjacent blocks from the gastric cardia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Seven years later, the subject is free of disease and repeated endoscopic examinations and biopsies have revealed no cancer.
